CLI and TUI (Terminal User Interface) for RepoBird.ai - trigger AI coding agents,
submit batch runs, and monitor your AI agent runs through an interactive dashboard.

Base URL: https://repobird.ai
Get API Key: https://repobird.ai/dashboard/user-profile/api-keys

Usage:
  repobird [command]

Available Commands:
  bulk        Submit multiple runs from configuration files
  completion  Generate shell completion scripts
  config      Manage RepoBird configuration
  docs        Generate documentation
  examples    Show configuration schemas and generate example files
  help        Help about any command
  info        Display authentication information
  login       Configure your API key securely
  logout      Remove stored API key
  run         Create a new run from a JSON, YAML, or Markdown file
  status      Check the status of runs
  tui         Launch the interactive Terminal User Interface
  verify      Verify current API key
  version     Print version information

Flags:
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.repobird/config.yaml)
      --debug           enable debug output
      --debug-user      enable debug user mode with mock data
  -h, --help            help for repobird

Use "repobird [command] --help" for more information about a command.
